oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Dr. Robert Cogswell introduces Dean Dixon and folk artists at the Hunter Museum
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Dr. Robert Cogswell, director of Tennessee Arts Commission Folklife Program (at podium) introduces photographer Dean Dixon (2nd from right) and artists profiled in the exhibit and book, ""Tradition: Tennessee Lives and Legacies,"" produced by the Tennessee Arts Commission, at the Hunter Museum, 2010.

All photographs for the book and exhibit were taken by Nashville photographer Dean Dixon under a contract with the Tennessee Arts Commission. Editorial copy provided by Dr. Robert Cogswell, director of the Tennessee Arts Commission Folklife Program.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Strong, Junior; Stewart, René; Smith, Roger; Hernández, René; Rodríguez, Eda; Harper, Roy; Dixon, Dean; Garduño, Celia; Cogswell, Robert
